about_the_game:
One Dandy Man Stands Up...
...Against Evil
...For love!

Yamada-kun (Age 36) is a programmer at a major game publisher. He hates his job. Alone in his apartment, deep into the night, he toils to create a game of his own: it's an RPG, and he is the hero, Brave Yamada!

Experience the essentials of Dandy Dungeon: first 10 minutes of the game and experience all the the line-drawing roguelike, loot-gathering fun of the game and the irreverently humourous tale of Yamada-kun's quest for love in the real world and his delusional dungeons!

Minimum:
  • OS: OS X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

name: Dandy Dungeon - Legend of Brave Yamada - Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 / 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

Recommended:

short_description: Yamada-kun (Age 36) is a game programmer who hates his job. Alone in his apartment, he toils to create his own game: an RPG, where he is the hero, Brave Yamada! Are you ready for a story-driven, romantic comedy roguelite-RPG?
